Dear ${u_customer_name_1},
We're pleased to inform you that the repairs on your smartphone have been successfully completed. Your final bill is now available for your review.
Invoice Details:
Invoice Number: ${number} Device Model: ${mobile_model} Device problem category: ${device_problem} Device Issue: ${device_issue} Basic Service Charges :- Rps 420 Screen Repairing charges :- 1500 Total Amount Due: Rps 1920 You can view and download your final invoice by logging into your account on our service portal. Please find the invoice in the "Billing" or "Invoices" section.
If you have any queries or require assistance regarding the invoice or repairs conducted, our customer support team is readily available to assist you.
Thank you for choosing our repair services. We appreciate your trust in us and look forward to serving you again in the future.
Best regards, MobileTech Solutions Mobile Number: +91-56452589

Dear ${u_customer_name_1},
We're pleased to inform you that the repairs on your smartphone have been successfully completed. Your final bill is now available for your review.

Please find the invoice in the "Billing" or "Invoices" section.

Best regards, MobileTech Solutions Mobile Number: +91-56452589
